Summary: 4 large glowing objects flying same flight path
divs: Sighting DetailsExited house to walk our dog and couldn't not help but notice 4 glowing objects above the rooftops. I started filming with my I phone and watched the path of these objects. Two petered out and then two more appeared from west to east. I tracked them until the lead one descended and petered out and the following orbs kept the path then faded out. Video available on request.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ventura
There were no other sightings in Ventura on or around November 4th 2012
